title: Mavs wax Suns, Defending Champs knocked out
description:
Blown out in Phoenix. The Suns get waxed by Dallas. Jalen & Jacoby discuss the one of the worst game 7’s they’ve seen. What does this mean for Chris Paul going forward? And will Deandre Ayton be signed to a max contract this offseason. Listen to find out. Also, Grant Williams was the surprise for the Boston Celtics in their game 7 win over the Milwaukee Bucks. The defending champs had no answer for the Celtics 3-point shooting. Find out what that means for Boston in their Eastern Conference matchup with the Miami Heat. Plus, it’s been a wild weekend… Mariah Rose graduates, Rangers, Flames win in OT, and much, much more.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
